attributes.action: require that both MOT stations and main Post Offices remain open until late evening.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasingly I am having to take time out from work and even holidays to visit concerns such as MOT stations and Main Post offices because they are so busy. 
 Demand for these services (and others I'm sure) is falling behind supply and I think something should be done about it.
 The only answer in my book is for late opening to be brought in.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
